abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if one of its allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description:
Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft, one target
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage

actions.name: Sling
actions.description:
Rangd Weapon Attack:+4 to hit, range 30/120 ft, one target
Hit: 4 (1d4 +2) Bludgeoning damage

actions.name: Weapon Invention
actions.description:
The Kobold uses one of the following options, and can use each one no more than once per day:
1. Acid: Ranged Weapon Attack:+4 to hit, range 5/20 ft, one target
Hit: 7 (2d6) Acid damage

2. Alchemist's Fire: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 5/20 ft, one target
Hit: 2 (1d4) Fire damage at the start of each of the target's turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

3. Basket of Centipedes: Throws the basket into a 5 ft square within 20 feet. A swarm of insects (centipedes) with 11 hit points emerges. At the end of the swarm's turn, it has a 50% chance to disperse.

4. Green Slime Pot: Throws a clay pot of green slime. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 5/20 ft, one target
Hit: The target is covered in a patch of green slime (chapter 5 of DMG).
Miss: A patch of green slime covers a randomly selected 5 foot section of wall or floor within 5 ft of the target

5. Rot Grub Pot: Throws a clay pot into any space within 20 feet, which breaks on impact. A Swarm of Rot Grubs emerges and remains a hazard in that square.

6. Scorpion on a Stick: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target
Hit:1 Piercing damage and the target must make a DC 9 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

7. Skunk in a Cage: The Kobold releases a skunk into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The Skunk has a walking speed of 20 ft, 10 AC, 1 Hit Point, and no attacks. It rolls initiative, and, on its turn, uses its action to spray musk at a random creature within 5 feet of it. The target must make a DC 9 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target retches and can't take actions for one minute. The target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a siccess. A creature that doesn't need to breath or is immune to poison automatically succeeds on the saving throw. Once the skunk has sprayed its musk, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

8. Wasp Nest in a Bag: Throws a small bag into a 5 foot space within 20 feet. A Swarm of Insects (wasps) with 11 Hit Points emerges. At the end of the swarm's turns, there is a 50% chance that it disperses.
